original_text: While the words were still in the king's mouth, there fell a voice from heaven, “O King Nebuchadnezzar, to you it is spoken: The kingdom has departed from you,
korean_text: 이 말이 아직도 나 왕의 입에 있을 때에 하늘에서 소리가 내려 이르되 느부갓네살 왕아 네게 말하노니 나라의 왕위가 네게서 떠났느니라

sentences.original_text: While the words were still in the king's mouth,
